text: Gaius, ana won raar vhuun nde ndɨɨi. Ana na ndi wo phena tɨgap, ana gangana vhuuŋra na mbui. Ana na garav, ana vhɨra mba guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi, ana vhɨra mbe gari. Erastus, ana kha ŋgu bakɨme gari guman pana ŋkɨɨa gari guma gum nzan fek Kuartus, mani wani won raar vhuun nde ndi mbai.
